title: Substances containing Cl - highest boiling point

content.question: A pure sample of which of the following compounds has the highest boiling point?

choices.label: <math alttext="L i C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>LiCl</mi></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="L i C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>LiCl</mi></math>

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
